title: suborg
description: A title for a position within an org.

org.description: The org which owns the sub organization.

sub.description: The sub org which owned by the org.

perc.description: The optional percentage of sub which is owned by org.

founded.description: The date on which the suborg relationship was founded.

dissolved.description: The date on which the suborg relationship was dissolved.

current.description: Bool indicating if the suborg relationship still current.
